pages.text: $(l:resources/malachite)Malachite$() as a material seems perfect for tools, best compared to $(item)Diamond$(), but much easier to combine with other materials.$(br)These combinations are where the fun begins, allowing for some uniquely intricate tools.

pages.title: Workstaff
pages.text: The perfect $(l:equipment/multitool)Multitool$():$(br)$(k:sneak) + $(k:use) allows you to switch between $(thing)Silk Touch$() and $(thing)Fortune$(), mining large tunnels at once and allows you to $(thing)strip$(), $(thing)till$() and $(thing)flatten$().

pages.title: Ultra Greatsword
pages.text: Its sheer size allows you to hit enemies from a greater distance.$(br)If you hadn't included the $(l:resources/paltaeria)Paltaeria$(), you probably wouldn't even be able to lift it.

pages.title: Bident
pages.text: A true powerhouse when dealing with aquatic creatures.$(br2)$(italic)It may have only two prongs compared to a $(item)Trident$()$(italic), but they are twice as pointy!

pages.title: Crossbow
pages.text: Shoots projectiles at a higher speed and precision compared to a mundane $(item)Crossbow$().
